import React, { useState } from 'react' const Checkout = ({ order, user }) => { const { items, shipping_charge, discount_in_percent, shipping_address, totalCost, totalItems } = order; const [firstName, setFirstName] = useState(''); const [lastName, setLastName] = useState(''); const handleFirstName = (e) => { setFirstName(e.target.value); } const handleLastName = (e) => { setLastName(e.target.value); } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(firstName, lastName); } return (

Checkout

{items.length}

  • Total
    ${totalCost}
  • Items
    {totalItems}
  • Shipping Charges
    ${shipping_charge}
  • Discount({discount_in_percent}%)
    -{totalCost * discount_in_percent / 100}
  • Total (USD) ${totalCost - totalCost * discount_in_percent / 100 + shipping_charge}

Shipping address

{ user.address.map((user) =>
{user.first_name} {user.last_name}
{user.address1}, {user.address2}, {user.state}, {user.pincode}

{user.phone}

Use this Address
) }
OR

Add New Address

Valid first name is required.
Valid last name is required.
Please enter a valid phone for shipping updates.
Please enter your shipping address.
Please select a valid country.
Please provide a valid state.
Zip code required.
) } export default Checkout
